definition[0]: to make a deep low sound like the sound a frog makes
definition[1]: to speak in a low rough voice, as if you have a sore throat
example[0]: ‘Help!’ she croaked, her throat dry with fear.
definition[2]: the sound that a frog makes
definition[3]: a low rough sound made in a person’s or animal’s throat
example[1]: The words came out as a dry croak.
